Nov 11 (Reuters) - 3i Group PLC III.L:: *3I GROUP PLC - RESULTS FOR THE SIX MONTHS TO 30 SEPTEMBER 2021 *3I GROUP - HY TOTAL RETURN OF £2,199 MILLION OR 24% ON OPENING SHAREHOLDERS' FUNDS *3I GROUP - FIRST FY2022 DIVIDEND OF 19.25 PENCE PER SHARE, IN LINE WITH POLICY *3I GROUP - HY NAV PER SHARE OF 1,153 PENCE (31 MARCH 2021: 947 PENCE) *3I GROUP - SAW GOOD GROWTH FROM OUR TWO INVESTMENT PORTFOLIOS IN FIRST HALF OF YEAR *3I GROUP - IS BEGINNING TO SEE A SIGNIFICANT COMPOUNDING EFFECT FROM PERFORMANCE OF TODAY'S CAREFULLY SELECTED PRIVATE EQUITY PORTFOLIO


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 11-NOV-202107:00:03 GMT
